titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-438, by Mr. Dreier.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 145.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 353.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 200, 1 Present (Roll no. 561).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/2/1999--Introduced. Makes it in order at any time on or before November 10, 1999, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules.
